title: c-string-equality
description: Using == on char* performs pointer comparison, use strcmp instead

title: use-sys-exit
description: Detected use of `exit`. Use `sys.exit` over the python shell `exit` built-in. `exit` is a helper for the interactive shell and may not be available on all Python implementations.

title: exec-detected
description: Detected the use of exec(). exec() can be dangerous if used to evaluate dynamic content. If this content can be input from outside the program, this may be a code injection vulnerability. Ensure evaluated content is not definable by external sources.
